overview: I collect information such as events, accidents, births, and deaths that occurred on "October 21" from 1920 to 2020 throughout the world. I comply one hundred years' worth of data sharing the keyword.  From the internet, I collect information such as events, accidents, births, and deaths that occurred on "October 21" from 1920 to 2020 throughout the world. The animation narrates the lives of protagonists "October" and "Haima," but it can also reflect the life of anyone. Most days that the artist discovered through her collection process revealed similar patterns throughout history.
